title: Watch Tab Removed From Top Navigation
custom_preconds: * User has latest version of the app
custom_steps:
Given the user has landed on the homepage 
When the user navigates to Scores Page
And the Watch Page
And the News Page
And the More Tab
custom_expected: Then the user will not see the Watch icon at the top nav bar

title: Configure Top Nav Bar for Home / Standings / News
custom_preconds: * User is logged in and is either on the Home, News or Standings Tab
custom_steps:
GIVEN I am either on the Home, Standings or News tabs
WHEN I look in the top left corner
custom_expected:
THEN there will be an account icon 
AND tapping that icon will launch the account settings

title: Account Icon is Stateful
custom_preconds: * User has latest version of App installed
custom_steps:
GIVEN I am either on the Home, Standings or News tabs
WHEN I look in the top left corner
custom_expected:
THEN there will be an account icon
And if I am logged in, the account icon will be blue
And if I am logged out, the account icon will be grey

title: Top Nav Bar -> Audio Icon
custom_preconds:
* User has latest version downloaded
* User is signed in
custom_steps:
GIVEN I am either on the Scores or Watch
WHEN I look in the top right corner
custom_expected:
THEN there will be an Audio icon furthest to the right
AND tapping that icon will launch the Audio Feed

title: Top Nav Bar -> Chromecast is Visible
custom_preconds:
* User has latest version downloaded
* User is signed in
custom_steps:
GIVEN that I am on network with a cast-able device
WHEN I look at the top right corner
custom_expected: THEN Cast will be to the left of the Audio icon

title: MLB Logo To Top Nav
custom_preconds: * User is on the Home Surface, Standings, Scores or Watch tabs. NOT News
custom_steps:
Given I am on Home Surface, Standings, Scores or Watch Tabs
WHEN I look at the center of the top nav bar
custom_expected: THEN I will see the MLB Logo
